Third-party Interactive Software

  • There are various third party packages that enable instant 3D interactive visualisation, slicing and animations of our data (NetCDF format by default), as well as conversion to other data formats.

Packages

  • ParaView: 3D visualisation, slicing and simple data manipulation, handles VTK files and can convert data to CSV and other formats.
  • VisIt: similar to ParaView
  • Panoply: summarises geospatial information of the global geospatial data
  • Ncview: useful for a quick check of geospatial data on the Caltech cluster. It can handle large data files more easily than most other packages.
  • Houdini: useful for more sophisticated representation of 3D turbulence and powerful data interpolation. Used by our Hollywood colleagues for CGI.
